  • Method Details

    • getGame

      public static Game getGame()
      Behaves as a singleton constructor for a new Game.
      Returns:
      either the new Game or the already created instance

    • getGame

      public static Game getGame​(java.util.List<Player> players, int currentPlayer, DeckDevelopmentCard deckDevelopmentCard, Market market, DeckLeaderCard deckLeaderCard, int numberOfPlayers, boolean lastTurn)
      Behaves as a singleton constructor for a Game that is getting restored.
      Parameters:
      players - is the list of players
      currentPlayer - is the player which turn is currently on
      deckDevelopmentCard - is the card shop
      market - is the marbles market
      deckLeaderCard - is the deck of leader cards
      numberOfPlayers - is the number of players currently playing
      lastTurn - is a boolean which indicates if the match is in the last turn phase or not
      Returns:
      either the restored Game or the already created instance

    • setPlayers

      Parameters:
      players - is the list of players to be set

      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - is the player to be set as current

    • isLastTurn

      public boolean isLastTurn()
      Tell if the current turn is the last of the game or not.
      Returns:
      true if is the last turn, false otherwise

      public boolean setNumberOfPlayers​(int numberOfPlayers)
      Set the number of players that will play the match.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - is the number of players
      Returns:
      true if the number is correctly set, false if the number of player is greater then 4 or smaller then 1
